message.body: Hey, have any plans for the weekend?
Hey! How are you? Actually, starting tomorrow, i'm in the studio for 2 Weeks recording a CD. How about you?
I'm doing well, glad to have some time off from work! I've got two jobs. That's awesome that you're recording
What do you play? Or do you sing?
May I ask what you do for work? This project is totally self-indulgent. The core of it is 9 songs about my ex. I'm singing (not well), playing guitar (m
y main instrument) and bass. The producer knows a drummer who's willing to play on it...we'll see... ;-)
Wow that's a big project the
I bartend and run food and also work on projects for a data company from my computer from home
I went to bartending school in NYC. Bartended one event: a wedding reception. Sliced my finger while making garni. Yeah... What city are you in? I'm fr
om Los Angeles, but in Tucson for the next month or so.
I'm in philly - and I sliced my finger this week haha
Crazy. I like Philly. Haven't been there in years. Never lived there, just visited when I lived in NYC. What music do you like?
